metadata.title: CVE-2023-4875 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Null pointer dereference when composing from a specially crafted draftmessage in Mutt >1.5.2 <2.2.12

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4875` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mutt - 1.5.24-1ubuntu0.6+esm3
mutt-patched - 1.5.24-1ubuntu0.6+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mutt package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.24-1ubuntu0.6+esm3').
